page.title: 05Southampton Midwife.
page.content:
{ A Midwifes point of view.}
We went along to visit a midwife she told us that she had to go through{4 {and a half years}training. She has been a midwife for 8 years and she has only delivered 3 sets of twins. At the moment she delivers mostly girls.She delivers approximately{5 babies in a {month.}In a week she approximately travels 100 miles.The oldest patient she has delivered a baby to is 43 years old and the youngest is 18 years old. The average weight of a baby is 7lb. She said that the nicest thing about her job is the happy families. She said that her job had changed because there was more specialized equipment and more involvement of fathers and family.
